titleStmt.title: SII 7.842: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 842. (A.R. No. 215 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiṅkaḷertaru taṉ toṅkal veṇkuṭaikkiḻ nilamakaḷ nilava malarmakaṭ puṇantu ceṅko locci k=karuṅkalikaṭintu maṉṉu palluḻi
yuṭṭeṉnavar muvaruḷ mānāparaṇaṉ ponmuṭiyānāp parumaṇip pacuntalai porukaḷat tarintu virakeraḷaṉai Āṉaik kiṭuvit tacaivil cuntirapāṇṭiyaṉait ti
caikeṭat tollaiyil mullaiyūrt turatti Olkalil veṇāṭṭaraicai ceṇāṭṭotukki mevupuka ḻirāmakuṭamuvar keṭa munintu velaikeḻu kāntaḷurccālai
kalamaṟuppit tāhavamallaṉu mañcak kevuteṉ ṟāṅkarum paṭaiyā lāṅkavan cenaiyuṭ kaṇṭappaiyyannum kaṅkātiranum vaṇṭamar kaḷiṟṟoṭu maṭiyat tiṇṭiṟal
viritaru vikkiyum vicaiyātittaṉum takumuraṭ cāṅkamayaṉumutal samarabhīru Ottuṭai nimircuṭar ponno ṭayṅkeri puraviyoṭum piṭittu tanṉāṭaiyil jayaṅkoṇ
ṇ ṭonṉār koḷḷipākkai Oḷḷeri maṭut torutanit taṇṭāṟ porutirai Uṭutta Ilaṅkaikkiṟaivan Alaṅkal muṭi parittu muṉ taṉakkuṭainta teṉṟamiḻmaṇṭalamuḻutu meṟi
n tiḻam puk=ku Ilaṅkeśvaranākiya vikkiramapāṇṭiyan parumaṇimuṭi taṭin tiṇṭiya villavar minavan veñciṉac caḷukkiyar vallavar mutaleṉa vaṇaṅka viṟṟirunta jayaṅkoṇṭa
coḻan Uyarnta perumpukaḻ kovirācakesaripanmarāṉa Uṭaiyār śrīrājādhrājadevaṟku yāṇṭu 2 10 8Āvatu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu
Oymānāṭṭuk kiṭkkaināṭṭuk kiṭaṅkilāna mummaṭicoḻanallūr Ūrom nilavilai yāvaṇam Eṅkaḷurt tiruttiṇ ṭīśvaramuṭaiya mātevar
koyilil śrīIrājādhirājaviṭaṅkar śaṇṭeśvaratevarpakkal koṇṭa kācu 100 Ikkācu nūṟuṅ koṇṭu nāṅkaḷe yeṉṟum śaṁtrātittavar sitdhāyap pañcavāram Uṭ
paṭac cilvariyum peruvariyum Ellām Iṟukka Itteva riṟaiyili Aṉupavikka k=kaṭavarāka viṟṟukkuṭutta nilamāvatu Eṅkaḷū
roṭum Eṟa variyiliṭ ṭeṅkaḷitāṉa vāṇiyanpūṇṭikkuk kiḻpāṟkellai Innāṭṭār varampāt tellaikku meṟkun tenpāṟke
llai pirahmateyam ciṟukāvirippāt tellaikkum villiyappāt tellaikku vaṭakku melpāṟkellai tevatānam caravatiyāṉa paranirupapa
rākkiramanallūr rellaik=kuk kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai meṟpaṭiyū rellaikkut teṟkum Iṉnāṟperellaiyuḷ ḷakappaṭṭa nila mi
kutikkuṟai vuḷḷaṭaṅka Uṇṇilam Oḻivinṟi Iṉnilattil menokkina maramum kiṇokkiya kiṇaṟum puṟṟun teṟṟiyu maṉaiyum maṉaipaṭappaiyum
Epperppaṭṭa Uṇṇilam Oḻivinṟi Iccuṭṭappaṭṭa Ūru mivūṟku nirpāyum tevatānam paranirupaparākkiramanallūrkku nirpāyntuvarum Eri
kaḷil muṉṟopāti Eriyum nīru miccuṭṭappaṭṭa Ūrum Erikaḷil ramuṭaiya māhaādevar koyil senāpatikaḷ mum
muṭicoḻamārācar paḷḷikoṇṭāṟ Arayaṉ Aruḷa Eḻuntaruḷivitta Umāskan=tasahitan 1 śrīrājādhrācaviṭaṅkaṟku nāṅka ḷiṟaiyili tevatānamāka viṟṟukuṭutta
paricāvatu Ūrāṟkum Eriveṇṭum siddhāya pañcavāram cilvarikaḷu maṟṟum Epperpaṭṭa Iṟai kaḷippittut tiruttiṇṭiśvaramuṭaiyāṟke yiṟaiyili tevatāna
māka Aṉupavikkakkaṭavārkaḷāka viṟṟukkuṭutta nilattil Uḻutu kuṭikaḷai Epperpaṭṭa Iṟaimaṟṟa kāṭṭappeṟātomākavu mippaṟicu viṟṟu vilaik kācum ca
ṇṭeśvaradevarpakkal vilaipporuḷu miṟaipporuḷumākak koṇṭu Ivvūrum Eriyu miṟaiyili tevatāṉamākki viṟṟu vilaiyāvaṇam ceytu kuṭuttom
tiruttiṇṭiśvarat teḻuntaruḷuvitta Irājādhrājaviṭaṅkatevar śaṇṭeśvaratevarkku kiṭaṅkilāṉa mummuṭicoḻanallū ruro minṉilattuk kituve vilai
yāvaṇamākavu mitu poruḷmāvaṟutiyākavum Ituvallatu poruḷmāvaṟutip poruṭ cilavolai kāṭṭapeṟātārākavu Iṟaiyili tevatāna
māka viṟṟukkuṭuttu Ikkācu ṉūṟum Innilattukku Iṟaiyiliporuḷum vilaipporuḷumākak koṇṭu vilaiyāvaṇam ceytukuṭuttom tiruttiṇṭīśvaramuṭai
ya mahaādevar śaṇṭecuvaradevaṟku kiṭaṅkilāṉa mummuṭicoḻanallū rurom nāṅka ḷiṟaiyili tevatānamāka viṟṟuk kuṭuttaparicu Oṉṟiṉāle Iru
ntu Ikkācu ṉuṟuṅ koṇṭu Iṟaiyili tevatānamāka viṟṟukkuṭuttom Ivarkaḷ colla Eḻutinen Ivvūr śrī
Itu panmaheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 7.842 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
